mapper.update:
update his_medi_enter_details
pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
enter_count = #{enterCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
validity_period = #{validityPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
drugs_numb = #{drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drugs_name = #{drugsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drugs_spec = #{drugsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
surplus = #{surplus,jdbcType=BIGINT},
enter_number = #{enterNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update his_medi_enter_details set pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enter_count = #{enterCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, validity_period = #{validityPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, drugs_numb = #{drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drugs_name = #{drugsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drugs_spec = #{drugsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} surplus = #{surplus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enter_number = #{enterNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,b.sale_price as salePrice FROM his_medi_enter_details as a left join his_pharmacy_detail as b on a.pharmacy_id=b.medicine_id where 1= 1 and a.validity_period >= CURRENT_DATE AND a.surplus>0
and a.drugs_numb like concat('%' #{parameter.drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.drugs_name like concat('%' #{parameter.drugsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by ${parameter.orders}
select his_medi_enter_details.* from his_medi_enter_details where his_medi_enter_details.pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by his_medi_enter_details.validity_period asc
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into his_medi_enter_details(id, pharmacy_id, enter_count, validity_period, create_user_id, create_date, update_user_id, update_date, drugs_numb, drugs_name, drugs_spec, price,surplus,enter_number) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.pharmacyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.enterCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.validityPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.drugsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.drugsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.surplus,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.enterNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select his_medi_enter_details.* from his_medi_enter_details where validity_period <= CURRENT_DATE and surplus > 0
